biblStruct.note: Saggi introduttivi di G. Andenna, Hubert Houben, M. Oldoni.

editorialDecl.p: OCR was reviewed, and 'rs' tags were added for proper nouns (those nouns that were capitalized in the print edition). All text is now in lowercase (to capitalize words at the beginning of a paragraph or after punctuation, a script will be needed). The text is now ready to be collated upon individual manuscripts.

quotation.p: Quotation marks were always represented by double quotation marks, open and closed, in the print edition.
Those marks have been retained when they meant a quotation or rewording of a specific source or manuscript.
They have not been retained when I marked the quote with said.

When I mark a passage with said, it is implied that the print edition had double quotation marks, open and closed, and that I am not retaining them. However, I am marking some passages with said though the source print edition had no quotation marks. In these cases, I am adding @rend="none" to said.

namespace.name: http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0
namespace.tagUsage: Used to mark words capitalized in the print edition, but not constituting a proper noun, such as "Sed" at the beginning of a sentence.

With type="content": note on the text content. With type="graphic": note on glyphs or graphemes. With type="mscorr": note on corrections made in the manuscript by the same hand or by a second hand. With type="segmentation": note on the text segmentation (arrangement of paragraphs or missing paragraphs). With type="textcrit": note on textual critical matters. With type="year": note on the year in which a fact actually happened according to a scholar (with @resp).
In the print edition the text considered redundant by the editor was between <square brackets> I am omitting those brackets in this file.

prefixDef.p: In the context of this edition, private URIs with the prefix "vat" point to a specific page of external PDF file vat.lat.3973.pdf, including the digital images of the A manuscript. For example, vat:29 dereferences to img/vat.lat.3973.pdf#page=29.

body.p:
"Eodem anno regina et Tancredus cum aliis multis,
idest Goffrido Britton et Unfredo Grauina, dominio et equitibus
ut fertur usus ad cxx peditumque non exigua manu, audacter
pergebant iuxta flumen Bradanum. Quibus comes occurrens
Alexander cum suis ita detriuit ac debellauit eos, ut Tancredus
fuge liberaretur presidio et Britto Gofredus, regina uero et Un
fredus cum multis aliis caperentur equitibus, omniaque eorum
direptioni predeque data sunt. Regina uero ducta sub custodia
est in Materam ciuitatem, in qua aliquanto peracto tempore
retenta, dimissa est sub iureiurando ut reuerteretur in Materam
et in Alexandri comitis custodia; set minime hoc impleuit. In
super mense Maio cum cc equitibus et peditum turba terram
uastauit Alexandri comitis Barensis".

Anno dominice incarnationis mcxvuii, indictione x; mense
Aprilis in Uenecia, Liguria, Emilia atque Flamminia Italie prouin
ciis, in Gallia quoque Transalpina, multorum domus contritis ho
minibus pluraque hedificia simul et ecclesie ingenti terre motu
concusse ceciderunt. Eodem anno mense Iulio, xvuii kalendas
Augusti, feria iia, luna in signo aquarii passa est eclipsim ab hora
octaua noctis usque in matutinum.
